class SoapAction;
Manages the data received from the single actions

this(in string host, in string port, in Actions[] actions);
Executes SOAP-actions.

Params:
string host Hostname/IP of router
string port Port of UPnP-Connection, usually 49000
Actions[] actions Array of Actions to perform, see soaptyes

string[SoapActionData] getReplies();
Get query results.

Returns:
Associative array of the form 
[<Action>: "reply1", …]


const string toString();
Returns string represesentation.

Returns:
String of the form 
reply1\nreply2
